titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

p.hi: I went to the Cathedral, & there celebrated the Holy Comm

. After breakfast I settled to work on the Preface, & resumed in the afternoon. Bulmer called on me to report progress. It seems that there is a chance that the redoubtable Corner will accept the reconstruction programme after all. Wynne–Willson did the letters. Voila tout!
